section.title: Configuring &productname; without DVR
section.para: By default in the KVM model, the Neutron service utilizes distributed routing (DVR). This is the recommended setup because it allows for high availability. However, if you would like to disable this feature, here are the steps to achieve this.
On your &clm;, make the following changes:
